name: Stay Vulnerable Melting Cream Blush
about: What it is:A breakthrough, mistake-proof, liquid-like cream blush that melts into a second skin for the most natural-looking wash of soft-focus color..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This first-of-its-kind water-resistant blush combines pigments with a non-greasy blend of weightless oils and spherical powders for a natural flush you can’t mess up. The ultralightweight, liquid-like cream melts on contact and blends to a smooth, satin finish that won’t cake, crease, or clog pores.
ingredients: Isodecyl Isononanoate, Silica, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Polyethylene, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dicalcium Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, [+/- MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR: Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 6 (CI 15850)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use a dense brush or your fingertips to dab onto the apples of your cheeks and blend. Apply more layers as desired. .-Complete your look with the Stay Vulnerable Liquid Eyeshadow and Stay Vulnerable Glossy Lip Balm (both sold separately), which come in the same five complementary shades as the Stay Vulnerable Melting Blush for effortless matching for eyes, cheeks, and lips.

reviews.review_title: Goes on quickly and blends well.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this as a replacement for the Rare Beauty liquid blush, and I like this more.  The color looks very natural, it blends well, and it lasts all day.  It melts as you run your finger over it and easily swipes across the cheekbone.  Color is build able if you want a bit more depth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love the color. but I don't much like how it applies or how it looks. looks kind of patchy ☹️ would like it to be softer and creamier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the nearly neutral blush last christmas and bought two new ones in nearly mauve recently, one for me and one for a friend. It’s amazing! I love rare beauty as it is but this product might be my favorites. The application is flawless and so easy. The colors are gorgeous and the packaging is so cute. Very good amount of product for the price as well. Definitely worth it, try it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: gorgeous and lasts a long time! ive had this for over a year and a half and it looks the same as the day i bought it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. The color is very flattering on my skin and it is very easy to apply! I use it everyday to layer over another one of my blushes and it’s perfect. Not only is the color really prett, but it also give a very nice shine, which I love !

reviews.review_text: I love this. I have fair skin and wanted a subtle blush. This works perfectly for me. I apply with my fingers and don’t have an issue blending. The packaging is really nice as well.

reviews.review_text: I enjoy using this blush for an everyday natural look. blends seemlessly and last for the full work day.

reviews.review_text: While I love the shade, the application and results are just..okay. Since it’s a cream blush, it’s a bit difficult to apply well with a brush, so I usually use my fingers. However, the result is almost always splotchy and does not give an even color, and it doesn’t not blend out well.

reviews.review_text: After using this product in multiple ways I found that this was always patchy on my skin. I would say that I have even smooth skin and no matter what it never sat right. Maybe it works for you but I really didn’t like it. The only thing nice abt it was the color of it when looking but otherwise… yeah no.

reviews.review_text: This is the first ever blush I've bought myself and it is amazing. I have a pale and freckled complexion and this colour and formulation gives me a clean, fresh and romantic look. it applies super easily and blends well with your finger, which is what I recommend to use for this product.   It gives a natural flush to the skin if you're looking for a more clean-girl aesthetic and you cannot tell you're wearing any product when it is on which is a massive plus for me! I have combination skin and this does not pool, pill or spread apart on my skin and stays all day and eventually fades away by evening.

reviews.review_text: I’ve purchased 2 of these in the past 3 years. I really do love them. This blush is for a muted, soft, daytime look. This is not for a full glam. This blush is for the girls who barely wear any foundation or enjoy soft, and natural looking complexion. The formula is blurring and wears nicely throughout the day. For a more heavy glam look, I would recommend the liquid blush version rather than this melting blush. For context, I wear this blush to work without any foundation, and for evening or outings I wear the liquid blushes from this line.   there

reviews.review_text: Perfect color for me! But the application takes a bit more time to get it just right. It's not as easy to apply as the soft pinch liquid blush. Staying power is surprising good for something that feels like a powder. I have sensitive skin and a lot of blushes make me break out, but not this one! Just docking a point because it takes longer than the liquid blush to get it to look perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have not worn blush in years because every time I get one it is either too pink or too orange or too purple. I have light auburn hair and being a redhead is sometimes hard. One of the sales ladies at Sephora suggested this one along with the fabulous mascara by Rare Beauty. I tried it on my arm and loved the colour but thought it might be a bit too strong for my fair skin. Wrong! It highlights my fairness wonderfully, and I must say it is easy to apply you don't need a lot. I will definitely buy this again, but it will be a long time as the little package seems to be very generous. I can apply with brush or fingers; it is lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cute color especially for summer on tan skin. Not too dewy, the perfect skin like finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it has the perfect amount of pigment, it’s very buildable and the shade (nearly mauve) is the perfect natural colour. This product last very long on the skin but the product itself also lasts long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this blush is absorbed into my skin wayyy too fast, no matter how much I apply I feel like it can barely be seen. it’s definitely very subtle so I would recommend if you want a flushed effect but be warned that this blush will be gone by the end of the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush provides a subtle blush look to your makeup without looking overbearing! Layers well on top of foundation too. I like using it on no makeup days to still give my skin a nice glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this blush! Both the color and texture are fabulous! The blush is creamy and, as the name implies, melts into the skin. It's easily buildable. The Nearly Apricot color is so good. As someone with fair skin and warm-undertone, I sometimes struggle to find a blush that isn't too peachy or too brown. This one is lovely and natural looking.   I'm probably a little older than Selena's key demographic but younger than her Only Murders in the Building co-stars. ;) If you have mature skin, consider this for a beautiful wash of color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is so sooth. It goes on and looks natural. You can go light or later on more and it seems to blend right in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best blush ever!!!! it literally lasts all day. it’s the perfect color, and it takes ages to hit pan. will repurchase a million times over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect rosy shade for my fair skin tone. I use it a lot in the winter/spring to bring a little color back to my face. It’s so creamy and buildable, and it didn’t break me out (I have very sensitive skin).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Although this blush has so many amazing qualities and i love it a lot. I do believe it lacks pigment. I expected it to look like the liquid blush from rare beauty still love it tho!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s super cute I love the packaging and the little mirror and stuff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: pros: super pretty color, and a nice packaging that’s easy to open, layers well on foundation/skin tints cons: feels chalky when you blend it out, looks patchy, hard to blend on bare skin, doesn’t last

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not long lasting. Fades quickly, you'll need to overapply in order for it to look like you have blush on once it fades. Wanted to love it, looks good at first but within minutes it's gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s good I’m not a fan of the packaging just because it’s easy to spread bacteria this way but at the end of the day it’s very smooth and if you know how to use it looks good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have the liquid soft pinch blush in shade grace and these two colors are almost identical and I love to pair them together. They are just gorgeous I definitely recommend ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I have to say I love this a product I will be hitting pan on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A cream to powder type of formula. Medium colour pay off so it’s not as pigmented as the liquid but i find it blends better. Good natural looking blush

reviews.review_title: Amazing Formula packaging needs some work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this blush and the formula is amazing but I only have 2 problems, 1 it’s a little hard to blend out but if you try hard enough you can and 2 the much bigger problem is the packaging. It’s so hard to get the blush out of there without smearing it all over the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush looked soo beautiful in store but once i tried it at home it was so so patchy and sheer. when i tried adding more to fix it, it just picked up all my makeup on from under and disappeared. very disappointing and will return :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is super cute. It’s super easy to apply, you don’t necessarily need a brush for this product. It does tend to melt away so you would need to reapply it throughout the day to maintain it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swatched this in store and it looked great. But when I got home the swatch had already faded. Also tried on my face but it just kind of melted away. Good for those natural days but not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty colour and beautiful packaging. I do really like this blush but wish they had more colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: You don’t get this, it last nothing worst purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm giving this 2 stars as it settles into my pores.  I have mature skin and maybe this is more for a young skin.  I would hope that the Sephora sales person would maybe know about this product and have recommended something else for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product a little bit ago and I love it!! It is such a pretty shade and stays in all day. It’s easy to blend and I don’t even need any setting spray. Would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this products is to die for!! the packaging is beautiful, Selena makes great products!! 10/10 recommend, worth every dollar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing. I think it’s worth it 100% I like it better than liquid blushes, because it can be buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so beautiful, i used it every single day ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: pretty shade & great texture but i find it fades fast

reviews.review_title: should go for the darkest red
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush has a delicate and smooth texture, and is very moisturizing. However, it is also easy to smudge and does not last long. It is recommended to choose darker shades, as they look very red but actually do not appear that way when applied. The deeper the color, the better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in LOVE with this product as soon as I saw it in stores. The liquid blushes are of course gorgeous, but these new shades provide what the liquid blushes didn't. Nearly Berry applies gorgeously on the skin, melting into a stunning berry color (imagine biting into a dark red cherry and using it for blush). The formula is extremely smooth and applies nicely for the most part. Like most products with this formula, it's easy for it to initially apply patchy, so make sure you spend time blending it well or use a damp sponge. This is the perfect product for day-to-day makeup. Something you can just throw on before you start your day and instantly feel 100 times more beautiful. I really enjoy the packaging on this product, it's smooth, sleek, and everything you need in a compact. This is a MUST PURCHASE! I can't wait to re-buy this! Grab it while you can

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how its not too heavy on the skin but it starts disappearing once i try to blend it in. It can be buildable sometimes and pretty but its just not my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is easily applicable I love it. Don’t need whole bunch though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After getting this product, I kinda felt like it was not worth the $22 it’s priced at but it is actually a really good product and I think it’s worth it 100% and I recommend it for anybody￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite blush I've ever used! it blends so well and isn't messy, it has good pigment, the shade nearly mauve is very pretty, its a bit light but it looks so natural on me its perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: This is the best blush I have ever used. Knowing I bought it about 2-3 weeks ago and I am almost halfway, this will be a repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: for medium skin tone if someone wants brown makeup look. perfect and gives you natural and glowy skin in small amount

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is gorgeous and it is so easy to blend! My only complaint is that it doesn’t last all day. It begins to fade after a few hours for me but I do live in a humid environment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I positively LOVE the colour & texture of this cream blush!!!  The colour is very pretty & feminine!!!  The texture is very soft, with a little going a LONG way!!!  An A+++++ cream blush!!!  It is money well spent!!!

reviews.review_title: Great for low key make up look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although I am 50 years young this blush is perfect for me since I am not a big blush person at all!  I don’t mind it does not last all day I spray with setting spray and does the job.. great blush for beginners just starting to wear makeup and for low key make up looks I have sensitive skin and no breakouts! Yay!

reviews.review_title: Tried so many times to make these work

reviews.review_text: Beware if you have texture/pores/rosacea, this sticks in your pores and emphasize the living daylights out of em. It didn’t blend well or look flattering :( gonna use as eyeshadows instead? Idk, just dtick with the liquid blushes

reviews.review_text: Today I received my package from UPS. I was very excited, but now I feel very disappointed because the blush arrived almost broken. It seems like the packaging isn't well designed; the blush is spilling out. Very sad.

j’adore ce blush, il s’estompe incroyablement bien et il est très pigmenté. je recommande

reviews.review_text: This blush is truly my favorite. I use this blush almost every day and it give me bold, yet subtle color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this from a friend, and its amazing!! do be cautious about keeping it around heat, as it will definitely melt!!! I love this color on me, and the pigmentation isn't too little or too much. I find this to be very blendable, and tbh I don't use a brush or beauty blender with this product, but rather my fingers to have some extra control! I love layering this with the soft pinch blush in hope, with the liquid towards my cheek bone and temple, and the cream blush slightly on the apple of my cheek!

But when I tried it it's so hard to blend in even with a brush (and with a brush it gets hair everywhere that is Impossible to get out) and it comes off really fast during the day even with setting powder and spray. I love the packaging though 10/10 for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The colour of this blush is absolutely gorgeous and it looks so flawlessly natural. Since u apply with fingers it’s easy to put in a bag for touch ups throughout the day too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade of berry for my pale complexion. Buildable and beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this blush. Initially I wanted something with a dewy finish, but after using it, when blended it gives a powder/matt effect that is so unbelievably natural. I love the colour too, its pigmented for sure but just the right amount. Can we take a moment for the packaging? It is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this cream blush! Perfect size and you don’t need much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this, the application is easy and it is not too pigmented. I will say u would get a different color cause this is hot pink but it’s awesome otherwise!!!! 🩷

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not as pigmented as the liquid blushes BUT its sooo easy to apply and great for touch ups on the go

reviews.review_title: The beauty is in the compact!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is really beautiful and impactful (immediate color with one swipe).   I don’t find that it lasts particularly long BUT I would buy it again because the compact the blush comes in is so beautiful and practical.   I love to be able to touch up my blush easily throughout the day so I take the compact with me in my purse.  Because of the mirror and size I always have a nice flush going!  TLDR: Not worth it if this will be your only blush, but absolutely worth it as a blush for on the go (and dainty/feminine looking in packaging)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to use and great for travel. Perfect natural pigment that blends easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a super light blush, personally that is how I like it but if you want something powerful then this is not for you, I leave you a photo. The light blush is from Rare beauty and the powerful red is from Milani for only $9

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is amazing it’s soo pretty and I just love it sm 😍😍😍 (the shade is nearly berry btw)

reviews.review_title: A must have in my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this melting blush I instantly fell in love with it. I'd repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Rare Beauty. I own a lot of products from this brand and I was really excited to add this to my collection. However, once you start blending it gets patchy and it disappears after a while. I like that is subtle but it has no staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so hesitant about the color the employee helped me pick but I honestly can't think of a better color blush for me now. It's easy to blend. It's creamy. Selena Gomez really knocks it out of the park with her makeup line

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this blush in Netrual pink and loved it. Decided to get Nearly Apricot for a coral makeup look and it did not disappoint! Took off one star because the product arrived broken. The color plate fell off and not secured when you put it back in the case. I decided to glue it back together so it's not a big deal but still...kinda sad that it arrived like that. Overall, I LOVE THE BLUSH THO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had found that the soft pinch liquid blush was very intense and hard to make look natural on my skin so i bought this, its much better for me because it blends really well, looks very soft and natural no matter where it is on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product so much, its so easy to apply and so buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product is great, has so many shades, user friendly, and lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS BLUSH!IT GIVES MY SKIN A MORE YOUTHFUL GLOW.IT GOES ON SO EASILY & PERFECT COLOR.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good price for such a pretty blush. If you want a rare beauty blush GET THIS SHADE!!! It’s very pretty and I love the texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Just got it and is now an essential in my routine. Love rare beauty and will continue to wear the products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is amazing!!!!! Super creamy and easy to blend!!! And super pigmented but yet super natural!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush and it’s size it fits in my go bag perfectly. I love how it glides on and the color, I apply with fingers it’s so easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product the only thing is that it is kinda hard to find the right brush since you don’t want your mess up the perfect shape that it comes with.Overall this is something you need!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is stunning. I use it for lips, eyes, and my cheeks! It blends like a literal dream! And sits so nicely on the face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer the other rare beauty blushes but these ones aren’t too bad. They do dry out after a while though so if you don’t plan on getting a lot of use out of them just don’t purchase.
